title: [FR] Show More than 3 Metrics & Tags from the Web UI

labels.name: area/uiux
labels.description: Front-end, user experience, plotting, JavaScript, JavaScript dev server

body:
### Willingness to contribute

No. I cannot contribute this feature at this time.

### Proposal Summary

Allow MLflow UI to show more than 3 "columns" for "Metrics" and "Tags". 
Within UI I can only see up to 3 metrics and tags so I don't have a "bird-eye view" of my experiment results. 
Using mlflow version set up for my org (mlflow 1.16) and not sure if this is already addressed in the latest version but still posting here as FR.

For example, even when there are space to right and additional metrics and tags are selected from the "Columns" drop-down, it only shows up to 3 metrics and 3 tags so I can't sort and look through multiple metrics and tags as I would like.
![Screen Shot 2022-05-31 at 8 57 50 PM](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/14896560/171307420-d7275105-50e7-4f4c-aef0-0bd733e9a09e.png)




### Motivation

> #### What is the use case for this feature?
I cannot see more than 3 metrics or tags from the web UI. I have to use `client.search_runs` or `mlflow.search_run` to get experiment run_name, metrics and tags and compare experiments and get a sense of runs within my experiment.

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for MLflow users in general?
Same as above, web UI should provide visibility into experiments without hassle but its very to navigate through multiple metrics and tags.

> #### Why is this use case valuable to support for your project(s) or organization?

> #### Why is it currently difficult to achieve this use case?
